entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
